Title: Tending to Ausgazur
Description:
Assigned tasks complete! I'll check back on these folks on my next scheduled patrol.

There is one more earthen I must tend to today. He was... he is very special to me.

You've been an especially considerate colleague, so I'd like for you to see him. Let us travel west a bit, closer to the falls.
RewardText:
You made it! 

<She looks at the outstretched hand of the earthen next to her and sighs.>

I admit that I am quite disturbed by what I've found here. Your presence is a comfort.
